hibernate-mapping.query: select lot from DpLotacao lot where lot.idLotacao = :idLotacao

select lot from DpLotacao lot where upper(lot.siglaLotacao) = upper(:siglaLotacao) and (:idOrgaoUsu = null or :idOrgaoUsu = 0 or lot.orgaoUsuario.idOrgaoUsu = :idOrgaoUsu) and lot.dataFimLotacao = null

select lot from DpLotacao lot where upper(lot.siglaLotacao) like upper('%' || :siglaLotacao || '%') and (:idOrgaoUsu = null or :idOrgaoUsu = 0 or lot.orgaoUsuario.idOrgaoUsu = :idOrgaoUsu) and lot.dataFimLotacao = null
select lot from DpLotacao lot where lot.idLotacaoIni = :idLotacaoIni and lot.dataFimLotacao = null
select lot from DpLotacao lot where lot.idLotacao = ( select max(idLotacao) from DpLotacao where idLotacaoIni = :idLotacaoIni )

from DpLotacao lot where ((upper(lot.nomeLotacaoAI) like upper('%' || :nome || '%')) or (upper(lot.siglaLotacao) like upper('%' || :nome || '%'))) and (:idOrgaoUsu = null or :idOrgaoUsu = 0 or lot.orgaoUsuario.idOrgaoUsu = :idOrgaoUsu) and lot.dataFimLotacao = null order by lot.nomeLotacao

select count(lot) from DpLotacao lot where ((upper(lot.nomeLotacaoAI) like upper('%' || :nome || '%')) or (upper(lot.siglaLotacao) like upper('%' || :nome || '%'))) and (:idOrgaoUsu = null or :idOrgaoUsu = 0 or lot.orgaoUsuario.idOrgaoUsu = :idOrgaoUsu) and lot.dataFimLotacao = null order by lot.nomeLotacao

from DpLotacao where idLotacao in ( select max(lot.idLotacao) from DpLotacao lot where ((upper(lot.nomeLotacaoAI) like upper('%' || :nome || '%')) or (upper(lot.siglaLotacao) like upper('%' || :nome || '%'))) and (:idOrgaoUsu = null or :idOrgaoUsu = 0 or lot.orgaoUsuario.idOrgaoUsu = :idOrgaoUsu) group by lot.idLotacaoIni )

select count(distinct lot.idLotacaoIni) from DpLotacao lot where ((upper(lot.nomeLotacaoAI) like upper('%' || :nome || '%')) or (upper(lot.siglaLotacao) like upper('%' || :nome || '%'))) and (:idOrgaoUsu = null or :idOrgaoUsu = 0 or lot.orgaoUsuario.idOrgaoUsu = :idOrgaoUsu)
from DpLotacao lot where dataInicioLotacao = (select max(l.dataInicioLotacao) from DpLotacao l where l.idLotacaoIni = :idLotacaoIni) and lot.idLotacaoIni = :idLotacaoIni
